resources.string: Please enable the use of statistics for better application performance.

uBlock allows you to directly change the way that you want to unlock the device, with just a simple swipe. The only thing that you have to do is swipe your finger on the edge of the unlock method of your preferred side (left / right).
The default pin value is \"0000\", if you want to change the default pin in this moment, press the image below. Otherwise you could make the change after in settings window.

The default password value is \"0000\", the keyboard is displayed automatically for you comfort, if you want to change the default password in this moment, press the image below. Otherwise you could make the change after in settings window.

The default gesture of the pattern is a simple line on the first three dots, if you want to change the default pattern in this moment, press the image below. Otherwise you could make the change after in settings window.

The default finger is any of your registered fingers previously, if you want to set a specific index or add a new finger, press the image below. Otherwise you could make the change after in settings window.
Do you want to repeat slides?
Do you want to block the new app installed?
The passwords doesn\'t match, please try again
The pin doesn\'t match, please try again
Draw a new pattern to unlock:
Pattern correct, press OK button to save
The patterns doesn\'t match, please try again:
Show fingerprint detector when starting functions related to this.
Block applications after the screen turns off.
Set a new fingerprint to unlock apps.
Fingerprint index selected to unlock apps:
There is a update on uBlock, do you want to install it?
Please wait, auto update in progress.
Show dialog when new applications are installed.
Fingerprint Service is not supported in the device
Hiding the icon from the application drawer, you should call *#*#123#*#* to launch the application, the application will close automatically.
Click here and choose your favorite color
There has been an unexpected failure :(
An error caused the application to crash, please send an email with the description of the error in the inputs below to fix it as quickly as possible.
Enter your comments regarding the problem:
This feature is not supported in this device
Where do you want to get the picture?
Change the background of uBlock screen dynamically.
This option will delete the image you have placed in the background.
You must enable certain permissions for the application to work correctly.
